text: Musa tan camukattarai nokki ‘‘en camukattare! Unkal mitu allah purintirukkum arutkotaiyai ninkal ninaittup parunkal. Avan unkalukkul (musa, harun ponra) napimarkalai erpatutti (ekiptiyaritam atimaikalay irunta) unkalai aracarkalakavum akki, ulakattil marra evarukkume alikkata (arputankalakiya katalaip pilantu cellutal, ‘mannu salva' enra unavu ponra)varraiyum unkalukku alittirukkiran'' enru kuriyatai (napiye! Nir avarkalukku) napakamuttuviraka
